tagline: An AI-powered cybersecurity suite for proactive network defense and IT management.

architecture.frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript, ShadCN UI, Tailwind CSS

keyFeatures.description: Provides a real-time, at-a-glance overview of system security status, active threats, network traffic metrics, and the status of monitored external websites.
Users can paste network logs, and the AI will analyze them to detect suspicious patterns, identify anomalies, and suggest mitigation actions.
Displays a live list of detected threats. Clicking a threat triggers an AI flow to provide a clear, non-technical explanation and actionable recommendations.
Presents security data through interactive charts, allowing users to visualize threat trends over time, network traffic by protocol, and the geographic origin of attacks.
A suite of proactive tools to enhance user security.

subFeatures.name: Secure Password Generator
subFeatures.description: Generates strong, random passwords and provides an instant AI analysis of their strength, explaining why they are secure.

keyFeatures.description: Transforms user-submitted problem descriptions into structured support tickets. The AI automatically categorizes the issue, assigns a priority level, and provides initial troubleshooting steps.
Users describe security objectives in plain English (e.g., 'Block all social media sites'). The AI translates this into a formal set of secure firewall rules.
Allows users to add and manage a list of external websites. The application tracks their status and runs on-demand AI security and performance analyses. Data is stored persistently in Firestore.
